summary: Bora Bora is a beautiful island group in the South Pacific Ocean, part of French Polynesia. It's known for its stunning lagoon, surrounded by a barrier reef, and two tall peaks, Mount Pahia and Mount Otemanu. The island is a popular tourist destination with luxurious resorts. The main town, Vaitape, is on the western side. People here speak Tahitian, French, and many also speak English. Bora Bora's economy relies on tourism and things like seafood and coconut products.
title: Bora Bora
